mapper.insert: insert into Issue(issue_content,member_code,issue_img,address, lat, lng, radius, hashtag) values(#{issue_content},#{member_code}, #{issue_img},#{address}, #{lat}, #{lng}, #{radius}, #{hashtag})
mapper.select: select b.member_code,a.member_nickname ,b.issue_code, b.issue_content, b.issue_img,b.address,b.lat,b.lng,b.post_time,b.hashtag from member a,issue b where a.member_code= b.member_code order by issue_code desc
